DOC.brief_summary: A placebo-controlled trial of BiDil added to standard therapy in African-American patients with heart failure.
DOC.detailed_description: The overall objective is confirmation of BiDilâ€™s Safety and Efficacy in African-American (AFA) Patients with Moderate to Severe Symptomatic Heart Failure.
DOC.criteria: African American male or female 18 years or older. NYHA Class 3 & 4. Have either a resting LVEF less than or equal to 35% (by any method) or a resting LVIDD greater than 2.9 cm/m2 BSA (or greater than 6.5 cm) with LVEF less than 45% (by echocardiogram).
